last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: It is up to Simon and Amanda to bring the Creature's reign of terror on the island to an end

name: Creature
overview: An amphibious shark-like monster attacks an abandoned secret military base and the people who live on the island.

seasons.name: Miniseries
seasons.overview: An amphibious shark-like monster terrorizes an abandoned secret military base and the people who live on the island it is located on. A marine biologist, as well as several other people, try to stop it before it is too late

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: At a secret research base, the government creates an amphibious, shark-like creature. When the creature escapes, the base is abandoned and the inhabitants have to deal with the ravenous monster

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: It is up to Simon and Amanda to bring the Creature's reign of terror on the island to an end
